verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> time, <S%G2540><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the report <S%G189><s%> concerning Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G3816><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants, <S%G3816><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer. <S%G910><s%> He <S%G846><s%> is risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%> That <S%G1223><s%> is <S%G5124><s%> why these powers <S%G1754><s%> work <S%G1411><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

For <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had laid hold of <S%G2902><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> him in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G2266><s%> of Herodias, <S%G846><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>'s wife. <S%G1135><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "It is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for you <S%G4671><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>"

When <S%G2309><s%> he <S%G846><s%> would have <S%G2309><s%> put him to death, <S%G615><s%> he <S%G846><s%> feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they counted <S%G2192><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

But when <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%>'s birthday <S%G1077><s%> came, <S%G71><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Herodias <S%G2266><s%> danced <S%G3738><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G3319><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> Herod. <S%G2264><s%>
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> he promised <S%G3670><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an oath <S%G3727><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> her <S%G846><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> she <S%G1437><s%> should ask. <S%G154><s%>

She, <S%G1161><s%> being prompted <S%G4264><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> said, <S%G5346><s%> "Give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> here <S%G846><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a platter <S%G4094><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer. <S%G910><s%>"

The <S%G2532><s%> king <S%G935><s%> was grieved, <S%G3076><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G3727><s%> of his oaths, <S%G2532><s%> and of those who sat at the table <S%G4873><s%> with him, <S%G2753><s%> he commanded it to be given, <S%G1325><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> and beheaded <S%G607><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prison. <S%G5438><s%>

His <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> was brought <S%G5342><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a platter, <S%G4094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to the young lady: <S%G2877><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she brought <S%G5342><s%> it to <S%G3384><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mother. <S%G3384><s%>

His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took the body, <S%G4983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> buried <S%G2290><s%> it; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G518><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Now when <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G402><s%> he withdrew from there <S%G1564><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G2596><s%> boat, <S%G4143><s%> to a <S%G2596><s%> deserted <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> apart. <S%G2398><s%> When <S%G2532><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G190><s%> they followed him <S%G846><s%> on foot <S%G3979><s%> from the cities. <S%G4172><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and he saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude. <S%G3793><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sick. <S%G732><s%>

When evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G4334><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This place <S%G5117><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> deserted, <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> is <S%G3928><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> late. <S%G3928><s%> Send <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may <S%G59><s%> go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the villages, <S%G2968><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> food. <S%G1033><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "They <S%G2192><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> to go away. <S%G565><s%> You <S%G5210><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> something to eat. <S%G5315><s%>"
They <S%G1161><s%> told him, <S%G846><s%> "We only <S%G1487><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> fish. <S%G2486><s%>"
He said, <S%G2036><s%> "Bring <S%G5342><s%> them <S%G846><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> to me. <S%G3427><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G2753><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G347><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the grass; <S%G5528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G740><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2486><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> and looking up <S%G308><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he blessed, <S%G2127><s%> broke <S%G2806><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> the loaves <S%G740><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> gave to the multitudes. <S%G3793><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ate, <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were filled. <S%G5526><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> took up <S%G142><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of that which remained <S%G4052><s%> left over from the broken pieces. <S%G2801><s%>

Those <S%G1161><s%> who ate <S%G2068><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> five thousand <S%G4000><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> besides <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> children. <S%G3813><s%>

Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G315><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> get <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to go ahead <S%G4254><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the other side, <S%G4008><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> he <S%G3739><s%> sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away. <S%G630><s%>

After <S%G2532><s%> he had sent <S%G630><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> he went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> himself <S%G2398><s%> to pray. <S%G4336><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> distressed <S%G928><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the waves, <S%G2949><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> contrary. <S%G1727><s%>

In <S%G1161><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> watch <S%G5438><s%> of the night, <S%G3571><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G565><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> they were troubled, <S%G5015><s%> saying, <S%G3754><s%> "It <S%G2076><s%>'s a ghost! <S%G5326><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> they cried out <S%G2896><s%> for <S%G575><s%> fear. <S%G5401><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> immediately Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> "Cheer <S%G2293><s%> up! <S%G1473><s%> It is <S%G1510><s%> I! <S%G1473><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G5399><s%> afraid. <S%G5399><s%>"

Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it is <S%G1488><s%> you, <S%G4771><s%> command <S%G2753><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the waters. <S%G5204><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Come! <S%G2064><s%>" Peter <S%G4074><s%> stepped down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and walked <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he saw <S%G991><s%> that the wind <S%G417><s%> was strong, <S%G2478><s%> he was afraid, <S%G5399><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> to sink, <S%G2670><s%> he cried <S%G2896><s%> out, <S%G3004><s%> saying, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> me! <S%G3165><s%>"

Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stretched out <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> took hold <S%G1949><s%> of him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "You of little faith, <S%G1519><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> did you doubt? <S%G1365><s%>"
When <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> got up <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat, <S%G4143><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> ceased. <S%G2869><s%>

Those <S%G1161><s%> who were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You are <S%G1488><s%> truly <S%G230><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"
When <S%G2532><s%> they had crossed over, <S%G1276><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Gennesaret. <S%G1082><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> the people <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1921><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> recognized <S%G1921><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they sent into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> surrounding <S%G4066><s%> region, <S%G2532><s%> and brought <S%G4374><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> who were <S%G2192><s%> sick, <S%G2560><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> they begged <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might <S%G680><s%> just <S%G680><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> the fringe <S%G2899><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> garment. <S%G2440><s%> As <S%G2532><s%> many as <S%G3745><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> it were made whole. <S%G1295><s%>
